nodes.description: This has great depth of flavor with its fresh apple and pear fruits and touch of spice. It's off dry while balanced with acidity and a crisp texture. Drink now.
nodes.title: Jean-Baptiste Adam 2012 Les Natures Pinot Gris (Alsace)

pageContext.title: Jean-Baptiste Adam 2012 Les Natures Pinot Gris (Alsace)
